00020 
00021 using System;
00022 
00023 using Niry;
00024 using Niry.Utils;
00025 using Niry.Network;
00026 
00027 using NyFolder;
00028 using NyFolder.Utils;
00029 using NyFolder.Protocol;
00030 
00031 namespace NyFolder.Protocol {
00033     public static class UploadManager {
00034         // ============================================
00035         // PUBLIC Events
00036         // ============================================
00038         public static event BlankEventHandler SendedPart = null;
00040         public static event BlankEventHandler Finished = null;
00042         public static event BlankEventHandler Aborted = null;
00044         public static event BlankEventHandler Added = null;
00045 
00046         // ============================================
00047         // PRIVATE Members
00048         // ============================================
00049         private static FileList acceptList = null;
00050         private static FileList uploadList = null;
00051         private static int numUploads = 0;
00052         private static ulong fileId = 1L;       // ID Zero is Reserved
00053 
00054         // ============================================
00055         // PUBLIC (Init/Clear) Methods
00056         // ============================================
00058         public static void Initialize() {
00059             // Initialize Events (None)
00060             SendedPart = null;
00061             Finished = null;
00062             Aborted = null;
00063             Added = null;
00064 
00065             // Create Thread-Safe File Lists Instances
00066             acceptList = new FileList();
00067             uploadList = new FileList();
00068             numUploads = 0;
00069             fileId = 1;
00070         }
00071 
00073         public static void Clear() {
00074             acceptList.RemoveAll();
00075             uploadList.RemoveAll();
00076             numUploads = 0;
00077             fileId = 1;
00078         }
00079 
00080         // ============================================
00081         // PUBLIC Methods
00082         // ============================================
00084         public static void Add (PeerSocket peer, string path) {
00085             // Create New File Sender && Update File ID
00086             FileSender fileSender = new FileSender(fileId++, peer, path);
00087             fileSender.SendedPart += new BlankEventHandler(OnSendedPart);
00088             fileSender.EndSend += new ExceptionEventHandler(OnEndSend);
00089 
00090             // Add to Accept List
00091             acceptList.Add(peer, fileSender);
00092 
00093             // Send Accept Message
00094             fileSender.Ask();
00095 
00096             // Raise Upload Added Event
00097             if (Added != null) Added(fileSender);
00098         }
00099 
00101         public static void Send (PeerSocket peer, ulong id) {
00102             FileSender fileSender = new FileSender(id);
00103             fileSender = (FileSender) acceptList.Search(peer, fileSender);
00104 
00105             // Remove From Accept and Add To The Upload List
00106             acceptList.Remove(peer, fileSender);
00107             uploadList.Add(peer, fileSender);
00108 
00109             // Start The File Sender
00110             fileSender.Start();
00111 
00112             // Update Num Uploads
00113             numUploads++;
00114         }
00115 
00117         public static void Send (PeerSocket peer, string path) {
00118             // Create New File Sender && Update File ID
00119             FileSender fileSender = new FileSender(fileId++, peer, path);
00120             fileSender.SendedPart += new BlankEventHandler(OnSendedPart);
00121             fileSender.EndSend += new ExceptionEventHandler(OnEndSend);
00122 
00123             // Add File Sender To The List
00124             uploadList.Add(peer, fileSender);
00125 
00126             // Start The File Sender
00127             fileSender.Start();
00128 
00129             // Update Num Uploads
00130             numUploads++;
00131 
00132             // Raise Upload Added Event
00133             if (Added != null) Added(fileSender);
00134         }
00135 
00137         public static void Abort (PeerSocket peer, ulong id) {
00138             FileSender fileSender = new FileSender(id);
00139             if ((fileSender = (FileSender) acceptList.Search(peer, fileSender)) != null) {
00140                 RemoveFromAcceptList(fileSender);
00141             } else {
00142                 fileSender = (FileSender) uploadList.Search(peer, new FileSender(id));
00143                 if (fileSender == null) return;
00144                 Remove(fileSender);
00145             }
00146 
00147             Abort(fileSender);
00148         }
00149 
00151         public static void Abort (string fileName) {
00152             FileSender fileSender = null;
00153             if ((fileSender = (FileSender) acceptList.Search(fileName)) != null) {
00154                 RemoveFromAcceptList(fileSender);
00155             } else {
00156                 fileSender = (FileSender) uploadList.Search(fileName);
00157                 if (fileSender == null) return;
00158                 Remove(fileSender);
00159             }
00160 
00161             Abort(fileSender);
00162         }
00163 
00166         public static bool IsInList (string filePath) {
00167             if (acceptList.HasFile(filePath) == true)
00168                 return(true);
00169             if (uploadList.HasFile(filePath) == true)
00170                 return(true);
00171             return(false);
00172         }
00173 
00174         // ============================================
00175         // PRIVATE (Methods) Event Handlers
00176         // ============================================
00177         private static void OnSendedPart (object sender) {
00178             // Raise Sended Part Event
00179             if (SendedPart != null) SendedPart(sender);
00180         }
00181 
00182         private static void OnEndSend (object sender, Exception e) {
00183             FileSender fileSender = sender as FileSender;
00184 
00185             // Update Num Uploads & Reset file Id if it's possible
00186             numUploads--;
00187             if (numUploads == 0) fileId = 1;
00188             
00189             // Upload Finished/Aborted, Remove it
00190             Remove(fileSender);
00191 
00192             if (e == null) {
00193                 // Raise Finished Event
00194                 if (Finished != null) Finished(fileSender);
00195             } else {
00196                 // Raise Aborted Event
00197                 if (Aborted != null) Aborted(fileSender);
00198             }
00199         }
00200 
00201         // ============================================
00202         // PRIVATE Methods
00203         // ============================================
00204         private static void Remove (FileSender fileSender) {
00205             if (fileSender != null) {
00206                 fileSender.SendedPart -= new BlankEventHandler(OnSendedPart);
00207                 fileSender.EndSend -= new ExceptionEventHandler(OnEndSend);
00208                 uploadList.Remove(fileSender.Peer, fileSender);         
00209             }
00210         }
00211 
00212         private static void RemoveFromAcceptList (FileSender fileSender) {
00213             if (fileSender != null) {
00214                 fileSender.SendedPart -= new BlankEventHandler(OnSendedPart);
00215                 fileSender.EndSend -= new ExceptionEventHandler(OnEndSend);
00216                 acceptList.Remove(fileSender.Peer, fileSender);
00217             }
00218         }
00219 
00220         private static void Abort (FileSender fileSender) {
00221             // Abort Upload
00222             fileSender.Abort();
00223 
00224             // Update Num Uploads & Reset file Id if it's possible
00225             numUploads--;
00226             if (numUploads == 0) fileId = 1;
00227 
00228             // Raise Aborted Event
00229             if (Aborted != null) Aborted(fileSender);
00230         }
00231 
00232         // ============================================
00233         // PUBLIC Properties
00234         // ============================================
00236         public static int NUploads {
00237             get { return(numUploads); }
00238         }
00239     }
00240 }
